namespace  except

Detailed Description

Contains the classes to do with error handling.

An error is a throwable pertaining to rather serious errors i.e., ones that could cripple the system if handled improperly. For that reason, it is worth considering, upon designing a handler whether or not to simply abort the program upon receiving an error.
